subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mike McFadden made two free throws with 8.7 seconds remaining and Robert Morris shocked the defending national champion Kentucky, 59-57, on Tuesday in the opening round of the N.I.T.
snippet: Mike McFadden made two free throws with 8.7 seconds remaining and Robert Morris shocked the defending national champion Kentucky, 59-57, on Tuesday in the opening round of the N.I.T.
